sentences.sContent: Displaced farmers are offered alternative plots in lieu of the land acquired by the government.
sentences.sContent_eng: Displaced farmers are offered alternative plots in lieu of the land acquired by the government.
sentences.sCn: 政府征收土地后会给农民提供一小块替代的土地。

sentences.sContent: An insurance policy is acceptable in lieu of an insurance certificate or a declaration under an open cover .
sentences.sContent_eng: An insurance policy is acceptable in lieu of an insurance certificate or a declaration under an open cover .
sentences.sCn: 可以接受保险单代替预约保险项下的保险证明书或声明书。

sentences.sContent: For me, it represents a potent adjunct to antidepressant medications and, for some patients, it's something you can take in lieu of pills.
sentences.sContent_eng: For me, it represents a potent adjunct to antidepressant medications and, for some patients, it's something you can take in lieu of pills.
sentences.sCn: 对于我，它是一个抗抑郁剂曾用药物的强有力的助手，对一些病人来说，它是能够代替药丸的东西。
